404.message: Oops... Seems like you have wondered far, far away

errors.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
Phone number can only contain numbers, spaces, '+' and '-'.

steps.title: Contact Us
steps.description: Send a message here, on Facebook, or give us a call — whatever suits you best. Describe your idea! Together we’ll consider the best solutions tailored to you. At this stage, you’ll also receive a preliminary estimate and timeline.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Our graphic designer will shine at this stage, preparing concepts and visualizations that reflect your company’s character and your target audience’s preferences.

steps.title: Coding
steps.description: Time to bring your idea into the digital space. Our code masters will ensure your product is as functional and responsive as possible.

steps.title: Finished Product
steps.description: Now you can enjoy your completed product and count on our ongoing support.

maja.name: Maja
descriptionParts: I am a graphic design graduate from the University of Social Sciences, with extensive experience in designing visual communication. My portfolio includes projects for renowned brands such as 'Lola Bianka', 'Just Unique', 'Marylin', 'Qiosque', and 'Naoko'.

At MMBS, I am responsible for creating designs that combine high aesthetics, intuitiveness, and full alignment with the client's strategic goals. My priority is to create coherent and functional visual solutions that effectively engage audiences and strengthen brand identity.

szymon.name: Szymon
descriptionParts: I have many years of experience in the IT industry, specializing in technologies such as TypeScript, Golang, and the design and optimization of SQL and NoSQL databases. I am passionate about creating advanced and intuitive solutions that precisely meet user needs and achieve business goals.

As a graduate of the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Lodz, I constantly strive to develop my skills and seek new technological challenges. I am ready to leverage my experience to support the realization of your projects.

maciej.name: Maciej
descriptionParts: My interest in programming, which began in high school with a fascination for algorithms, has evolved towards designing intuitive user interfaces and creating complex business applications. I combine analytical thinking skills with a focus on the end-user experience.

For years, I have specialized in creating and implementing ERP-class systems, delivering efficient and reliable solutions for businesses. For me, programming is not just a job but above all a passion, which I pursue by participating in diverse and challenging projects.

bartek.name: Bartek
descriptionParts: As an entrepreneur and strategist with a passion for innovation, at MMBS I am responsible for business development, building relationships with key clients, and developing growth strategies. Concurrently, as an HR Business Partner at 'Wyciskarka Potencjału', I manage HR operations and talent development.
The experience gained from hackathons, industry conferences, and mentoring programs motivates me to initiate groundbreaking projects and build lasting and valuable business partnerships.

cards.title: Websites
cards.description: We create modern, responsive, and aesthetic websites tailored to your needs. We ensure intuitive navigation, clarity, and functionality so your clients will enjoy coming back to your site.

cards.title: Online Stores
cards.description: We design functional and easy-to-use online stores that support your sales and business growth. An intuitive interface, security, and full responsiveness are our standard.

cards.title: SEO / SEM
cards.description: We take care of your brand's visibility online. With effective SEO and SEM campaigns, you’ll attract more customers and boost sales—right where they’re looking for your offer.

cards.title: Logo and Visual Identity
cards.description: We create cohesive and memorable visual identities that reflect the character of your brand. From logo to colors and typography—everything refined with your audience in mind.

cards.title: Design
cards.description: We design aesthetic and functional interfaces that grab attention and enhance usability. We focus on clarity, detail, and user experience.

cards.title: App Development
cards.description: We design and develop modern mobile and web applications—intuitive, efficient, and tailored to your business goals. From idea to deployment.

steps.title: Contact
steps.description: Write to us, tell us about your idea and needs.

steps.title: Brief
steps.description: Together we gather all the information needed for the project.

steps.title: Analysis
steps.description: We research the market, your industry, and your target audience.

steps.title: Concept
steps.description: We create an initial idea for the look and functionality.

steps.title: Graphic Design
steps.description: We develop a thoughtful and aesthetically pleasing design.

steps.title: Prototype
steps.description: We prepare a clickable preview you can test.

steps.title: Coding
steps.description: We develop the website or app according to the design.

steps.title: Testing and Revisions
steps.description: We check the functionality and make any necessary changes.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: We publish the finished product and support you after launch.

powerivanchukova.title: Power Ivanchukova
powerivanchukova.shortDescription: A site for Yevheniia Ivanchukova, a fitness coach, with some light shop capabilities and automations

mediaList.story: Story from Power Ivanchukova Instagram page, recommending MMBS Studio

description: Built with Svelte + Skeleton UI, the platform delivers a fast, lightweight, and highly responsive experience with a modern design. We placed strong emphasis on performance and accessibility – every media file is loaded dynamically with Skeleton placeholders, ensuring smooth interactions even on slower connections. The website also complies with WCAG standards, making it inclusive and user-friendly across different devices and audiences.

Integrated with Stripe as a secure and flexible payment gateway, the system automates critical processes for the client. It generates invoices for every transaction, manages automated paychecks, handles taxes, and keeps a complete purchase history for end users. This allows the business owner to focus entirely on content and product updates without worrying about the financial and administrative side.

To further improve usability, the application automatically detects a user’s location and adjusts the interface language accordingly, supporting English, Polish, and Ukrainian. This feature makes the website accessible to a broader, multilingual audience while maintaining a personalized experience.

The solution was deployed on Netlify, ensuring free hosting and minimal operating costs, while Google Cloud handles backend integrations. Together, this stack guarantees scalability, reliability, and smooth delivery of resources. From day one after launch, the platform received positive client feedback, proving both its technical efficiency and its business value.

ngxMetaPixel.title: ngx-meta-pixel
ngxMetaPixel.shortDescription: An Angular package designed to simplify the integration of Meta Pixel into projects
description: This Meta Pixel integration package streamlines embedding Meta Pixel into Angular applications, supporting versions 16 through 20. Simply add some tags to the Meta Pixel html code provided by Meta and that's pretty much it.

Package provides implementation of all existing Meta Pixel events, provides a way to distribute app specific events as well as provides a way to make the implementation GDPR complient with an optional fast and streamlined flow.

zuzannaLucinska.title: Zuzanna Lucińska
zuzannaLucinska.shortDescription: A site for Zuzanna Lucińska, a notary, serving as her business card website

items.question: How much does it cost to build a website or app?
items.answer: The cost depends on the project scope — its features, complexity, and graphic needs. After a brief conversation, we’ll prepare a free, tailored quote.

items.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
items.answer: A simple project takes about 2-3 weeks; more complex implementations start from 4 weeks. The exact timeline is agreed individually.

items.question: Can I edit the content on the site myself after it's done?
items.answer: Yes! We build sites on systems that allow easy content editing without coding knowledge. We also provide short training or instructions.

items.question: Do you help with domain and hosting setup?
items.answer: Yes — we can assist at every stage, including selecting and configuring a domain, hosting, and company email.

items.question: Do you offer support after project completion?
items.answer: Yes. After deployment, we’re available for updates, fixes, or further development — you can always count on us.

items.question: Can I commission only the design without coding?
items.answer: Yes, we also offer standalone graphic designs — for example, to pass on to your own development team.

items.question: Do you also build online stores and mobile apps?
items.answer: Yes. We create online stores, web apps, and mobile apps — tailored to your industry and customers.

items.question: Can you help with SEO and marketing?
items.answer: Yes. We provide support in SEO optimization and basic SEM activities as well as visual identity.
